description: Yeehaa is a transformative design expert with extensive experience in academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science, Yeehaa excels in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design. Authored 'What Is Ecosystem Architecture?' and curated 'Align The Misaligned.' Driven by a passion for impactful solutions.
blurb: Ecosystem architecture merges decentralization with regenerative design, leveraging diverse fields to build and sustain healthy, distributed networks and communities.
